ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that when an Account Contact Relation is associated with an Account of type 'Provider', and the user's role contains 'EDRD', the Contact's related Account of type 'Provider', then role should be Allied Staff only.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "EDRD"), Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Provider', Contact.Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Provider', NOT(INCLUDES(Roles, 'Allied Staff')), ISPICKVAL(Account.Provider_Type__pc, 'Physician'), OR( ISPICKVAL(Contact.Account.Provider_Type__pc, 'Nurse'), ISPICKVAL(Contact.Account.Provider_Type__pc, 'Pharmacist'), ISPICKVAL(Contact.Account.Provider_Type__pc, 'Nurse Practitioner') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An EDRD user can create a Physician â€“ Nurse/Pharmacist relationship with the role as Allied Staff only.
